00028 TextFileWriter::TextFileWriter()
00029 {

00033  * Clean up.

00035 TextFileWriter::~TextFileWriter()

00039 /*
00040  * Write the entire file, the header and body.
00041  */
00042 void TextFileWriter::WriteFile(const std::string &fileName, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData)
00043 {
00044         OpenFile(fileName);
00045         WriteFileBody(textData);
00046         CloseFile();
00047 }
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * Open the file stream.
00051  */
00052 void TextFileWriter::OpenFile(const std::string &fileName)
00053 {
00054         fileStream.open(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::out);
00055         if (!fileStream)
00056         {
00057                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileCreateException e;
00058                 throw e;
00059         }
00060 }
00061 
00062 /*
00063  * Closes the file stream.
00064  */
00065 void TextFileWriter::CloseFile()
00066 {
00067         fileStream.close();
00068         if (fileStream.fail())
00069         {
00070                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileWriteException e;
00071                 throw e;
00072         }
00073 }
00074 
00075 /*
00076  * The fhe parameters to the file in the format name=value.
00077  */
00078 void TextFileWriter::WriteFileBody(std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData)
00079 {
00080         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator it;
00081         for (it=textData.begin(); it!=textData.end(); it++)
00082         {
00083                 fileStream << (*it).first << "=" << (*it).second << std::endl;
00084         }
00085 }
